response.json is the body of the following curl call:
- Adapted by hand to remove the `eval_count` field.
-- req.sh --
curl -v -X POST http://localhost:11434/api/generate -d '{
"model": "llama3.2:1b",
"prompt": "tell me a joke",
"stream": false
}'
-- response.json --
